org.jplot2d.renderer

Class ImageAssemblyInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.renderer.ImageAssemblyInfo

  • public class ImageAssemblyInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains a map to associate components to their bounds and future rendered images.

      • put

        public void put(ComponentEx comp,
       java.awt.Rectangle bounds,
       java.util.concurrent.Future<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> future)
        Puts a component and its future into this assembly info. Z-order: The 1st put component is on the bottom. The later is on top.
        Parameters:
        comp - the component
        bounds - the bounds of the given component
        future - the future of the given component
